original_title:
The Texas Legislature will now move toward eliminating PROPERTY TAXES, according to State Rep. Brian Harrison.

Get it done, and do it in every state.
  — The Donald
article_summary: Texas Legislature aims to eliminate property taxes, sparking debate over property rights, taxation, and school funding. Critics argue that property taxes are a form of government theft and negatively impact homeowners, particularly the elderly. Some propose charging the federal government taxes for holding land within states as a potential solution.</s>
